name: Luis Baez

education.title: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science
education.meta: University of South Carolina,  August 2017 – May 2021

education.title: Masters of Science (MSc) in Computer Science
education.meta: University of South Carolina,  August 2021 – May 2022

about:
I spent my childhood in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina &#127754 where I discovered my passion for computers. 

Using the shared family computer, I would research many topics about the computer I was using, things such as 'how does this mouse work?'. From there I obtained an ever growing curiosity in computers. I started taking courses in highschool geared towards computer science such as college level mathematics courses and even an computer communications course. 

In college, I became very involved in the Computer Science community and did everything I could to further grow my skill-set and passion within Computer's and Technology.
